mapper.select: SELECT item_no as itemNo, item_name as itemName, item_desc as itemDesc, item_price as itemPrice, img_file as imgFile FROM item
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_tb(order_no, order_quantity, rec_name, rec_phone, rec_addr, rec_detail_addr, rec_postcode, rec_request, payment_method, card_type, installment, bank_type, item_no, memberId) VALUES(order_seq.nextval, #{orderQuantity}, #{recName}, #{recPhone}, #{recAddr}, #{recDetailAddr}, #{recPostcode}, #{recRequest}, #{paymentMethod}, #{cardType}, #{installment}, #{bankType}, #{itemNo}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_no as orderNo, i.item_name as itemName, o.rec_name as recName, o.order_quantity as orderQuantity, i.item_price * o.order_quantity as totalPrice, o.memberId FROM item i JOIN order_tb o using (item_no) WHERE o.memberId = #{memberId}
